name: Calculator: The Game
description:
In a world of calculators, one dared to become a game.

Sure, you've used calculators before, but have you ever "played" a calculator?

Welcome to Calculator: The Game where you'll manipulate numbers by adding them, subtracting them, converting them, reversing them, and stuffing them through portals ... yes ... PORTALS.

Along the way you'll get to know Clicky, your adorable assistant who will hack the calculator and unlock new powerful buttons so you can destroy all the numbers ... oh wait, that's a lie, you won't be destroying any numbers ... but you WILL destroy 200 puzzles ... with NUMBERS!!

I've been told by HR that I need to tone it down because this language does not match the target demographic so from here on out I'm only allowed to use bullet points and "Gamer Marketing Terminology".



Calculator: The Game Features:

  • LCD DISPLAY for extra long equations
  • COMFORTABLE BUTTONS designed for modern gameplay
  • CLICKY, THE SNARKY ASSISTANT who will help you win
  • PUZZLES! 200 numerical conundrums to solve
  • FUNCTIONING solar panel
  • APPROVED for use in Calculator: The Game
  • BATTERIES not included
